definition: of or relating to or involving the lungs and stomach, a mixed nerve that supplies the pharynx and larynx and lungs and heart and esophagus and stomach and most of the abdominal viscera
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or involving the lungs and stomach
- of or relating to the vagus nerve
= synonyms: vagal
noun
- a mixed nerve that supplies the pharynx and larynx and lungs and heart and esophagus and stomach and most of the abdominal viscera
= synonyms: nervus vagus, pneumogastric nerve, tenth cranial nerve, wandering nerve
